definition: a plan/a planar graph/a plane figure
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

sentences.english: B: Do you have the floor plan of the building?
sentences.chinese: 你有没有这大厦的平面图？

sentences.english: The plan of the new development is on show at the town hall.
sentences.chinese: 镇公所大厅展出了新开发平面图。

sentences.english: Agent is showing the shop's floor plan to the clients.
sentences.chinese: 物业代理在给客户展示商铺平面图参考。

sentences.english: How to draw the mining plan and cross charts an are recommended.
sentences.chinese: 绘制剥采计划平面图和断面图的方法。

sentences.english: B:Can you show us the floor plan first?
sentences.chinese: 你可以先让我们看看平面图吗？

sentences.english: You can then use these to trace or cut and paste into new floor plans of your own design.
sentences.chinese: 你可以利用这些追查和酱或减成新平面图贵自己设计。

sentences.english: He drafted his plans for the park.
sentences.chinese: 他给公园绘制了平面图。

sentences.english: The town hall mafia will prevent this plan going through.
sentences.chinese: 镇公所大厅展出了新开发平面图。

sentences.english: Design Xiasha campus plan, in campus election spots around 10 spots.
sentences.chinese: 设计下沙校园平面图，在校园景点选10个左右景点。

sentences.english: Integrating the sorted map to make statistic analogic map.
sentences.chinese: 将分类后的平面图相加，得到统计类比图。

sentences.english: Some louvers indicated on the floor plans are located at high level.
sentences.chinese: 部份于平面图上显示之百叶窗安装于楼层之高位。

sentences.english: The orientation of individual houses may be different from the above plans.
sentences.chinese: 每幢花园别墅的座向可能与以上平面图不同。

sentences.english: It required the highly efficient and flexible use of floor plans .
sentences.chinese: 它需要的高效率和灵活运用平面图。

sentences.english: For some buildings a vertical section is more informative than a plan.
sentences.chinese: 有些建筑的立面图能比平面图提供更多的信息。

sentences.english: Construction operations must strict be abided by the planar graph approved by the firefighting department .
sentences.chinese: 展台搭建单位应依据消防管理部门批准的平面图施工。

sentences.english: Shape is an area enclosed by lines or curves.
sentences.chinese: 平面图是一个由封闭的直线或曲线构成的区域。

definition: rendering (visual representation of how things will turn out)
bird's-eye view/see also 俯瞰圖|俯瞰图[fu3 kan4 tu2]
bird's-eye view/see also 鳥瞰圖|鸟瞰图[niao3 kan4 tu2]
configuration of rooms in a residence (e.g. 3BR 2 Bath)
